name: histiocytosis
definition: A lymphatic system disease that is characterized by an excessive number of histiocytes. [url:http\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Histiocytosis, url:http\://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/ency/article/000068.htm]
